source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(LastModifytime) AS LatestDate from dbo.data_source

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
FROM dbo.Data_source
WHERE LastModifytime >  '@{activity('LkpOldWatermark').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}'
  AND LastModifytime <= '@{activity('LkpNewWatermark').output.firstRow.LatestDate}'

SELECT '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactory_Name,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as Pipeline_Name,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as RunId,
'@{item().name}' as Source,
'@{pipeline().TriggerType}' as TriggerType,
'@{pipeline().TriggerId}' as TriggerId,
'@{pipeline().TriggerName}' as TriggerName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,
'@{activity('load_csv_files').output.rowsCopied}' as rowsCopied,
'@{activity('load_csv_files').output.rowsRead}' as RowsRead,
'@{activity('load_csv_files').output.usedParallelCopies}' as No_ParallelCopies,
'@{activity('load_csv_files').output.copyDuration}' as copyDuration_in_secs,
'@{activity('load_csv_files').output.effectiveIntegrationRuntime}' as effectiveIntegrationRuntime,
'@{activity('load_csv_files').output.executionDetails[0].source.type}' as Source_Type,
'@{activity('load_csv_files').output.executionDetails[0].sink.type}' as Sink_Type,
'@{activity('load_csv_files').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as Execution_Status,
'@{activity('load_csv_files').output.executionDetails[0].start}' as CopyActivity_Start_Time,
'@{utcnow()}' as CopyActivity_End_Time,
'@{activity('load_csv_files').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.queuingDuration}' as CopyActivity_queuingDuration_in_secs,

'@{activity('load_csv_files').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.transferDuration}' as CopyActivity_transferDuration_in_secs

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select table_name,table_schema from lokesh_db_dev.Information_schema.tables
where table_type='base table'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactory_Name,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as Pipeline_Name,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as RunId,
'@item().TABLE_NAME' as Source,
'@{pipeline().TriggerType}' as TriggerType,
'@{pipeline().TriggerId}' as TriggerId,
'@{pipeline().TriggerName}' as TriggerName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,

'@{activity('Copy data1').output.rowsRead}' as RowsRead,
'@{activity('Copy data1').output.usedParallelCopies}' as No_ParallelCopies,
'@{activity('Copy data1').output.copyDuration}' as copyDuration_in_secs,
'@{activity('Copy data1').output.effectiveIntegrationRuntime}' as effectiveIntegrationRuntime,
'@{activity('Copy data1').output.executionDetails[0].source.type}' as Source_Type,
'@{activity('Copy data1').output.executionDetails[0].sink.type}' as Sink_Type,
'@{activity('Copy data1').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as Execution_Status,
'@{activity('Copy data1').output.executionDetails[0].start}' as CopyActivity_Start_Time,
'@{utcnow()}' as CopyActivity_End_Time,
